post.author: 권칠환
post.content:
DPC has a client in the financial software arena with the following
need. We have made many placements with this client in the past and we can
help get you in there too if you're available, interested and well
qualified.

Title: Systems Administrator IV (Unix - Apache)
Location: Tampa, FL
Duration: Perm
Salary: Open
Positions: 1

Description:

*Provide Apache and Tomcat infrastructure support. Provide
troubleshooting of application server environment.
* Provide performance monitoring, tuning of Apache/Tomcat and Java
based applications.
* Provide detail analysis and troubleshooting of HTTP, HTTPS and SSL
protocols.
* Provide Java application support. 24x7 on call duty required.


Requirements:

Bachelor's degree in Computer Science related field. 2-7 years
technical expertise in support of web. Application server experience in Apache
and Tomcat. Knowledge and working experience of Linux, J2EE
applications, network protocols with focus on SSL, HTTPS and HTTP protocols.
Application server technology and UNIX, SML knowledge needed.

Please refer to job # DC11558

Steve Craig
DPC - Recruiter
603-627-5020x 214-w
603-315-3091-c
603-627-5025-f
scraig@dpcit.com
www.dpcit.com
post.title: Systems Administrator IV (Unix - Apache) in Tampa, FL
